issue.title: Block graph.facebook.com in Racional App
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.51

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

||graph.facebook.com^$app=cl.racional.app

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Hello! The app "Racional" in Android connects every time when you open the app connects to graph.facebook.com to track you and give personalized ads. I think that you can add this rule "||graph.facebook.com^$app=cl.racional.app" to a filter of AdGuard, like AdGuard for Spanish/Portuguese (because Racional is an app for inversions of Chile ) or AdGuard Tracker Protection. Thanks!

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- 
![IMG_20221026_210531](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/79816807/198161160-1e9c9d50-9f44-4dd7-b6a5-41efb40b916c.jpg)
 -->

</details>




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Block graph.facebook.com in Mercado Libre app
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.51

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

||graph.facebook.com^$app=com.mercadolibre

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Hello! The app of "Mercado Libre" in Android connects every time when you open the app connects to graph.facebook.com to track you and give personalized ads. I think that you can add this rule "||graph.facebook.com^$app=com.mercadolibre" to a filter of AdGuard, like AdGuard for Spanish/Portuguese (because MercadoLibre is a major Latin America company) or AdGuard Tracker Protection. Thanks!

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![IMG_20221026_205939](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/79816807/198160622-f5e79c9e-a554-4b6d-afd5-9a63607c43f7.jpg)


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.11 Browser: | Yandex AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (sia.ru),
Hide your User-Agent () DNS filtering: | server: `sdns://AQIAAAAAAAAAFDE3Ni4xMDMuMTMwLjEzMDo1NDQzINErR_JS3PLCu_iZEIbq95zkSV2LFsigxDIuUso_OQhzIjIuZG5zY3J5cHQuZGVmYXVsdC5uczEuYWRndWFyZC5jb20`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/windows/filters/15.txt, User+rules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

AdGuard Tracking Protection

issue.body:

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: www.reddit.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.reddit.com/r/popular/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reddit.com%2Fr%2Fpopular%2F) ### Comment > Using Samsung Internet along with the Adguard content blocker I've noticed that the bothersome reddit "open in app" popups keep appearing. Tried using user rules similar to those found here: > https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MrBukLau/filter-lists/master/filters/mobilefilters.txt > but could not get the site to work properly, at most the popups dissapear but also does the scroll function, making the site unusable. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/xXL368q.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Content Blocker v2.6.1 Browser: | Samsung Browser Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese
